item.title: Hideous mobile layout
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Just remember everyone, the mobile theme is not built for functionality as much as it being made for speed and mobile friendly. On my phone (480x320) it works far better than trying to use the desktop layout. Mainly because I dont even have multitouch to zoom. Sure, its not perfect but it does work.
Its just made so that it will load fast even on EDGE connections.
